name: WooLayout
author: Batugan Design (Rex Anthony D. Eubanas)

sections.description:
WooCommerce is the most popular wordpress plugin for ecommerce with a templated pages. Editing or changing its templated pages requires basic knowledge in web development.

WooLayout is a powerful extension for WooCommerce that allows you to fully customize the WooCommerce pages. Create and Design your WooCommerce Pages by adding, switching or removing woocommerce elements by dragging and dropping woocommerce elements in the field. its simply and easy.

Future Development

  • woocommerce my account pages
  • woocommerce cart pages
  • woocommerce checkout pages
  • woocommerce email template

Woolayout PRO

Click Here and grab the Woolayout PRO.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.8 or greater
  • Woocommerce Plugin

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Woolayout, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Woolayout” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.8 or greater
  • Woocommerce Plugin

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Woolayout, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Woolayout” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

What are the minimum Requirements

  • Latest version of Woocommerce Plugin

Why do we need to install WooCommerce?

WooCommerce is a powerful, extendable eCommerce plugin that helps you sell anything. Beautifully.

While Woolayout is a powerful extension for woocommerce that allows you to edit the layout of the woocommerce pages.

Is it compatible to all wordpress theme?

yes, it is

How to fix a premium theme with a templated structure for woocommerce?

Some Premium Theme has a templated structure or overriding woocommerce template via theme. Click Here to know more.

Just remove or delete the woocommerce folder inside your theme via ftp or cpanel.

Template files can be found within the /wp-content/yourtheme/woocommerce/ directory:

Is it compatible with genesis theme?

Yes! Just make sure the “genesis connect to woocomerce” plugin is installed

I have an idea how to improved this plugin

All of your idea are welcome for the improvement of this plugin Click Here.
